headline: Amgen (AMGN) Falls 5.8% as Novo Nordisk Hammers Its Weight Loss Drug Trial
summary: Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) is one of the These 10 Stocks Took A Shocking Fall. Amgen Inc. extended its losing streak to a fourth straight day on Monday, dropping 5.84 percent to close at $272.44 apiece as investors sold off positions despite positive results from its weight loss drug trial, after Novo Nordisk—maker of the blockbuster Wegovy […]

headline: New Amgen obesity drug data disappoint Wall Street
summary: Full Phase 2 study results showed side effects that led people to stop treatment with MariTide, as well as weight loss effects that weren’t as strong as previously reported.
